origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenFinanceAPI.get_transaction_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves the transaction data of a specific green financial product based on the product ID and time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'productID', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The unique identifier of the green financial product.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the transaction data, e.g., one_year, six_months.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'transactionData', 'description': 'The transaction data of the green financial product for the specified time frame.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenFinanceAPI.get_transaction_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'productID'是'GB12345', 'timeFrame'是'one_year'.
